mean_en: (not used in the progressive tenses) if one thing includes another, it has the second thing as one of its parts; to make somebody/something part of something
sentence: Elephants, frogs and birds can be included in the category of "animals."
sentence_trans: 大象、青蛙和鸟可以被包括在“动物“这个类别里。
word_etyma: in进入 + clude关闭 → 关进去 → include包括
